(SINGING) Doo doo doo-dooo-doo. Doo doo doo-dooo-doo.
(SINGING) Doo doo doo-doo-doo doo-doo doo-doo doo-doooo-doo.
I couldn't be happier to see you.
This “Happy Little Elves” game is so stupid!
You tap and wait and tap and wait… and for what?
So your pretend town can have more pretend flowers than your pretend friends?
What a colossal waste of time!
Unless… I buy an bushel barrel full of elf-berries!
(SNEAKY CHUCKLE) That should speed things up.
Oh well, I'll just tell Apple my kid did it and get a refund.

The {0} leads into the first bend.
And now Fat Tony informs me that the {0}, who is currently stalled on the starting line, is your winner!
And the {0} is racing around the track in the wrong direction!
No wait, they're the only one racing in the right direction!
The {0} wins by default for being the only functioning vehicle!
And-- What's this?! All the Karts appear to be stalling out.
No one has been refueling the Karts all day and they've run dry!
And the {0} is the winner, as the only one to get out of their Kart and run across the finish line!
Tune into this week's Simpsons to find out how things go for Apu and his temporary workers! Sunday 8/7 central on FOX!
Looks great. You were so right to steal it… or get it fairly. Although I'm betting you stole it.
You've already got a lemon tree. Why not go steal something in the real world?
Oh no, someone beat you to it!
Quick, if you don't plant it within 24h you'll lose it!
You stole a lemon tree! Congratulations, hero!
Someone has stolen your Lemon Tree! Now you're sadder than if you'd never had it in the first place.
You didn't plant the Lemon Tree so it's been returned.
The Lemon Tree’s back! The idiot who stole it forgot to plant it.
A friend has captured Sideshow Bob! You snooze you lose!
A friend has arrested Snake in your Springfield!
Sideshow Bob has been spotted in the area.
Snake has been spotted in the area.

This outfit requires Chief Wiggum who will unlock at level 17!
In me or the merchandise? Both? That’s what everybody says…
Greta comes with a premium quest line which will unlock at level 31!
Lurleen comes with a premium quest line which will unlock at level 15!
Now you can take advantage of Gil’s limited time offer: buy one, get a second for the same cost as the first!
Twist my arm and I’ll throw in a third for the exact cost of the first and second.
Uter comes with a premium quest line which will unlock at level 25!
Mr. Lampwick, I'm still not sure your crusade against Kirk Douglas is the best pursuit.

I know all about the Oscar noms. Kirk Douglas wouldn't shut up about them. He kept saying, “I'm about to win an Oscar my first time up for one. If I want shrimp, I should get all the shrimp in the world!”
He's one of America's finest actors, nominated for three Academy Awards, winner of a Lifetime Achievement award, AND an impressive cartoon voiceover work.
I know all about the Oscar noms. Kirk Douglas wouldn't shut up about them.
He kept saying, “I'm about to win an Oscar my first time up for one. If I want shrimp, I should get all the shrimp in the world!”
Now Burt Lancaster, he was a Hollywood celebrity with class. Would remember your name, your birthday, and even bake you a cake. Had a handshake like George Washington's.
The Springfield Library keeps thorough entertainment news records. We can check to verify your story…
Springfield, we must protect ourselves from the forces of Douglas! Discard all signs of the beast!
Sir, don't damage those DVDs of Last Vegas.
If I mark the price down any lower, I will have to pay people to take them. And even then they will say, “Last Vegas? Ugh.”

Michael Douglas is but a Horseman of Kirk the Oppressor! We must free ourselves from their narrative tyranny! They no longer can control us, forcing us to engage in silly behavior for their amusement!
Michael Douglas is but a Horseman of Kirk the Oppressor! We must free ourselves from their narrative tyranny!
Magnificent performance, Mr. Lampwick! This high school hasn't been so moved since the days Moleman bloodied our stage in Richard the II.
Thank you. And shove it. I have to spout a bunch of frufru nonsense AND choke down dry Salisbury steak? Forget it! I'd rather dine on juicy rotisserie pigeon, hot off the trash can.
Is it how to create a Douglas-proof barrier around any home or shanty town?
You said Kirk Douglas told you it was his first Oscar nomination. But in 1953, he got his second one.
Also, the Academy Awards party only served shrimp cocktail in 1954… the same year Burt Lancaster received HIS first nomination.
I believe the man who took your shrimp was not Kirk Douglas, but in fact Burt Lancaster!
Oh. Only now do I realize how that might not be so great.
Guess I'll never know why I got saddled with this bum's life. Fate or chance or Kirk Douglas, I gotta make the best of it.
There's no point in trying to anticipate the answers to why we're here. The essence of life is its mystery, and only when we accept that can we focus on living.
Samuel Beckett was right. Hobos do possess a deeper insight. I know the perfect job for you, if you're willing to work for free cafeteria food.
You're going to get it. You're all going to get it! Especially whoever gave me this storyline and all his accomplices!
I hope someone thought to give you a job at the homeless shelter. Or at least a job to stay with everyone else in the brown house.
I don't need shelter. I have the one thing that truly matters, the one thing no one can take from me: my fantasies of destroying all who have wronged me.

And {0} is sleeping at the gate!
Round the Final Bend and Headed for Home!
In protest of dog racing’s declining popularity, the racers solemnly link forelegs and cross the finish line as one.
Still, somebody has to win, so let’s say… {0}!
{0} opens up a commanding lead. He heads into the third turn, and… WHAT’S THIS?
It appears a little girl has fallen in love with him. Her father is filling out adoption papers, and… {0} HAS A HOME!!!
{0} is out like a shot! Now he turns, and explains to the others that the rabbit they’re chasing is not, in fact, real.
The dogs are humiliated… They’re looking for someone to blame… I believe they’ve chosen me!
Yes, here they come! In my final moments, I’d like to award the race to {0}.
And now Fat Tony informs me that {0}, who is currently napping on the backstretch, is your winner!
A stray laser light beam has wandered onto the track.
Hours later, {0} is the first to realize the futility of chasing the beam, and gets the victory!
{0} is out of the gate and wins the inaugural Springfield Downs 1-meter Sprint!
{0} is first out of the gates.
Then, on the basis of a random number generated by this app, the “race” is awarded to {0}!
As they enter the backstretch, it’s {0}’s race to lose!
And he does. {0} is the winner!
{0} calls his bluff, turns over three sixes, and wins the hand!
These dogs can really play poker!
{0} blazes into the lead, but appears to have thrown his cat jockey.
In fact, NONE of the dogs has a cat jockey on its back.
There ARE cat jockeys in this sport, right? Anyway, {0} wins!

Get your tailgate party going for the Supe-- er, Big Game. I said Big Game. Whew, close one!
Send Springfielders Tailgating to crank up the party!
The Tap Ball Championship is over! But what happened to the fans?
Check out the Tailgate Party in the store to keep the party going.
In this years Treehouse of Horror episode, what do the aliens consider to be mankind's highest achievement?
Answer to unlock an exclusive Mayan Homer outfit. Get it on the first try and win 10 donuts as well!
DVRs That Let You Skip Commercials
Place the artifacts together to complete a special decoration and unlock exclusive content! Check back each day to find more.
Any good storyteller knows that the best stories are mostly lies. Get Young Grampa Simpson and the Aircraft Carrier today and hear your lies straight from the source!
Anchors away! Don Brodka and Anchor Management are sailing into town, get them now!
There’s only one cure for the crushing ennui of modern living, and that’s cheesy acrobatics! Let Circus Acrobat put on a show for you at the Cirque De Puree today!
Have you got a date for the prom? Young Barney and the Ice Fishing Shack have arrived to find out. Get them today!
This deal is no con even though it’s for a con man. Get Jim Hope and Kid First Industries before they steal away!
Is there anything more beautiful in this world than Marge Simpson? Young Artie Ziff and the Marge Sculpture Garden are here to debate that question. Get them now!
We all know what the greatest game in the world is – golf! Lee Carvallo and the Mini Golf Castle have arrived, take a swing at them now!
An astrolabe is a device used to take astronomical measurements. Get the Personalized Talking Astrolabe now to learn more useless trivia like this!
The Witch is now available in the Store. Check her out before she turns everyone into newts!
If there’s one thing Springfield doesn’t have it’s a yarn store – till now! Get Kathy from Personnel and the Yarn Barn today!
You have completed your four-hour jobs.
If I tap you, you get a donut.
I'm afraid I can't let you do that, Gerald.
Daisy, Daisy, give me your answer do…
I'm half crazy, all for the love of you.

The Pagans are ready with their tributes! Come back and tap them!
The Gnome has escaped again! Log in and catch him to collect your goodies!

In S1E1, "Simpsons Roasting On an Open Fire", where do Homer and Bart first encounter Santa's Little Helper?
In S15E7, "Tis the Fifteenth Season", what does Homer impulse buy at the mall instead of saving money for the family Christmas tree?
In S18E9, "Kill Gil, Volumes I & II", who stalks Homer all throughout the episode after they go see Krusty's Kristmas on Ice?
In S17E9, "Simpsons Christmas Stories", who does Grampa spend Christmas Eve with when the Simpsons won't let him in?
In S30E10, "Tis the 30th Season", what does Marge stand in line all night to buy for Black Friday?
Okay, sure. But in the end she doesn't actually get a GL50 9K Smart TV. Why not?
Because she sacrifices it to help Gil get a Futon Friend for his granddaughter
Because her feet froze in the cold and she falls and gets trampled
Because it was a bait and switch and the store didn't have them anyway
Right, right. Gil's the worst. We're all agreed. But what does Homer do to make her feel better about not getting the TV for the kids for Christmas?
He books them a Christmas trip to Florida
He steals a GL50 9K Smart TV off a loading truck
In S4E9, "Mr. Plow", when Homer first encounters the snow plow at an auto show, what does he daydream of using it for?
Plowing away protesters at the White House
In S31E10, "Bobby, It's Cold Outside", Lenny divulges the initials of the town package thief, "SB". Who does the package thief turn out to be?
Pfft, that one was soooo easy. But why did Burns want to steal everyone's Christmas presents?
Because he didn't get any love from his parents
Because Burns bought Costington's and wanted people to have to rebuy their presents
Does Burns really need a reason to be evil? (hint: no he doesn't, but this is not the answer)
In S12E8, "Skinner's Sense of Snow", when the children are stuck in the school due to a snowstorm, how does Skinner deal with an unruly Nelson?
He hangs Nelson from a coat hook
He duct tapes Nelson to a desk
He gives Nelson an atomic wedgie to assert his dominance
In S7E11, "Marge Be Not Proud", what video game does Bart steal from the Try-N-Save because Marge won't get it for him for Christmas?
In S22E8, "The Fight Before Christmas", what does Otto use to fuel the train that Bart takes to The North Pole?
In S28E10, "The Nightmare After Krustmas", what is Maggie worried that the Gnome in the Home will do while she sleeps?
Steal her soul with its piercing eyes
What is Homer's favorite Christmas-time beverage?
Sorry, Homer broke the answers on that question by spilling eggnog on them. We'll give you a gift card anyways.
In S26E9, "I Won't Be Home for Christmas", why does Homer end up staying late at Moe's on Christmas Eve?
Because Moe had set the clock in the bar to two hours behind
Because the bar gets snowed in and they can't get out
Because he's hiding from The Grumple who won't stop stalking him
In S9E10, "Miracle on Evergreen Terrace", without an alarm clock, how does Bart ensure that he wakes up in time to open Christmas presents in the morning?
He has Milhouse call to wake him up
He eats a bunch of sugar to stay up all night
If Lisa leaves at 2pm on a train going 50mph to Shelbyville, and Bart leaves at 3pm on his bike going 80mph towards North Haverbrook, who will arrive first?
Martin: You have failed to give adequate data to solve the problem.
Comic Book Guy: Worst. Trivia question. Ever.
Actually, all the answers were correct. Have a gift card.
In S31E22, "The Way of the Dog", what does Marge try to get Santa's Little Helper to wear for a Christmas photo?
A Christmas wreath around his neck
In S12E8, "Skinner's Sense of Snow", when Homer and Flanders are stuck in the car getting carbon monoxide poisoning, what does Homer hallucinate?
Getting blasted in the face with a ranch dressing hose by belly dancers
A group of scantily clad Marges feeding him donuts off the vine
An incredible future where every night is pork chop night
Okay smarty pants, well riddle me this…who saves Homer and Flanders from the car just before they die of carbon monoxide poisoning?
Barney dressed as a big baby
Previously we asked you where Homer and Bart first encountered Santa's Little Helper in the first episode. Did you answer that question correctly on the first try?
Are you kidding? I don't even remember what I had for breakfast this morning!
In S25E8, "White Christmas Blues", why is Homer so excited when it finally begins snowing during Christmas season?
Because he no longer has to pick up the dog poop
Because he can finally wear clothes that hide the fat rolls
Because he's been yearning to wallop Bart with snowballs
In S23E9, "Holidays of Future Passed", when the family finishes their Thanksgiving feast, what does Marge want to immediately do?
